title: The Liberation
synopsis: Amid an intense battle, a local legend is tested and a long-hidden truth comes to light. Meanwhile, the emperor ends up losing his mind and ultimately the planet is freed from a tyrannical rule.

title: The War of Two Worlds
synopsis: The Voltes V team survives some hiccups on the way to the enemy planet that is faced with a volatile civil situation. Meanwhile, the prince, who was sedated, wakes up and decides to jump into action.

title: Battle Forth to Boazania
synopsis: A warrior emerges to protect Earth from a deadly bomb planted by the enemies amid the final battle. Subsequently, the Voltes V team and the others embark on a difficult journey.

title: The Ultimate Battle for Planet Earth
synopsis: The outer space enemies start to crumble as a result of Voltes V's sudden attack. This proves to be a great opportunity to drive them away from Earth for good.

title: The Traitor Within
synopsis: A visitor from outer space captures Voltes V's creator from the secret base in the Alpine mountains. The heroes are then inadvertently led to a spot that might become the setting of their triumph.

title: A Father's Last Wish
synopsis: The father of a recently rescued newborn takes a huge risk to meet his family. However, as fate would have it, he catches the enemy's attention before he can make it.

title: The Deadly Seeds of Hate
synopsis: The truth about the biological origins of three of the Voltes V members might become a major cause of concern as it can fuel unrest among those working to defend Earth against the outer space enemy.

title: Draco's Plan
synopsis: The captive member of the enemy clan decides to employ a manoeuvre to establish the truth about the biological origins of three of the Voltes V boys.

title: Draco's Capture
synopsis: After receiving a tip-off about some robot tests in Popolonesia islands, the Voltes V team gets too close to capturing an important member of the enemy clan.

title: Commander Robinson's Falling Star
synopsis: When the sole female member of the Voltes V team falls victim to the enemy's mind-controlling robot, her commander father makes the ultimate sacrifice to save her.

title: Zandra's Sacrifice
synopsis: With the prince's safety and happiness in mind, a fiery female warrior from the army of the outer space enemies single-handedly tries to take out one of the Voltes V members.

title: A Boazanian Fighter's Tragedy
synopsis: Voltes V's new red eagle-operating ally, who recently died, is sought by the enemies for treason. The warrior sent to fetch him is defeated but shown mercy by the heroes.

title: The Mystery of Armstrong's Past
synopsis: Three of the Voltes V team members learn a shocking truth about their lineage and biological father's past. Turns out, they share their blood with the outer space enemies that they have been fighting all this while.

title: The Mechanical Eagle's Secret
synopsis: Voltes V's mysterious new ally, a red eagle robot piloted by a well-wisher, turns out to be a part of the secret rebel base in the Alpine mountains.

title: Volt-in with the Mysterious Mechanical Eagle
synopsis: Struggling with the new technique, Voltes V receives support from its mysterious new ally, a powerful machine that seems to be piloted by a well-wisher.

title: Ultra Electromagnetic Beast Cannon
synopsis: Voltes V must deploy a unique technique to tackle the enemy's new overly strong robot. A mysterious ally chimes in with a solution to all their problems.

title: The New Enemy, General Ozlack from Boazania
synopsis: When a new player in the game brings his powerful weapon to the battlefield, things may get more difficult than imagined for the Voltes V team members.

title: Voltes V Learns a Lesson from a Puppy
synopsis: One of the Voltes V members grows fond of a puppy whose mother died at the hands of the enemies. Amid a fight, it ends up identifying the culprit robot.

title: The Death of the Boazanian Advisor, Zuhl
synopsis: An important member of the enemy team loses his life for committing serious mistakes, including an attempt on the life of the prince who is leading them against Earth's defense forces.

title: Zuhl's Evil Scheme
synopsis: The enemies hatch a sinister plan to extract secrets from Voltes V's creator in captivity. They create an illusion with the help of robots to deceive him.

title: Mysterious Letter Written in Blood
synopsis: The Voltes V team members successfully decode the cryptic blood-written message. Meanwhile, the enemies are about to send another deadly robot to the battlefield.

title: Dr. Armstrong's Rescue
synopsis: Enduring unfathomable suffering in captivity of the enemies, the creator of Voltes V sends a cryptic message written in blood to the team of heroes.

title: Father, the Earth is Near!
synopsis: The heroes find Voltes V's creator in the captivity of the enemy but dismiss him as a robot spy designed to trick them. However, one of them witnesses something that makes him question their previous judgement mid-combat.

title: The Urgent Need for Rigid Training
synopsis: The new senior's strict attitude does not sit well with the Voltes V team. However, when caught in a dangerous situation, they come to understand his purpose.

title: The Destruction of Big Falcon
synopsis: When the enemies fire on all cylinders and unleash chaos on Earth, the commander and his crew seem to be on the verge of losing ground. However, a ray of hope appears at this point to bring them back into the game.

title: The Present from the Emperor
synopsis: The emperor of the enemy planet secretly employs a manoeuvre against the Voltes V team. Even the prince leading the attack on Earth is unaware of the truth.

title: The Trap of Father and Child
synopsis: The enemies assign a sinister task to a hapless slave and get him to infiltrate the Voltes V hangar. His only motivation behind following their orders is his daughter's freedom.

title: The Triumph of Human Love
synopsis: The enemies put a sinister plan into motion to abduct one of the Voltes V members. However, it fails miserably as the power of human love comes into play.

title: Voltes V Revived from the Dead
synopsis: The commander and his colleague find an infallible solution to the Voltes V problem. However, before they can put it into action, the enemies track them down.

title: The Recovery of Voltes V
synopsis: With Voltes V incapacitated, the concerned forces pull out all the stops to defend Earth. Meanwhile, the enemies try to use this opportunity to seal their victory.

title: Voltes Docking Unsuccessful
synopsis: The Earth's future is put at risk and the enemies gain the upper hand as they find a way to incapacitate the formidable Voltes V.

title: Jamie's Dream Forbodes Disaster
synopsis: The only female Voltes V member comes as a ray of hope for her commander father and his troops in the middle of an unprecedented enemy attack.

title: A Conspiracy Against Prince Zardoz
synopsis: A threat looms over the prince who is leading the enemies against the heroes on Earth. However, he is saved by a hair's breadth as one of the loyalists warns him just in time.

title: Voltes Team's New Member, Octo-1
synopsis: Considered of no use at first, an octopus robot comes in handy when the Voltes V team ends up in a dangerous situation with very little hope for survival.

title: Mark and his Thoroughbred Horse, Alpha
synopsis: An incident brings back one of the heroes' cherished memories of the time he spent with his thoroughbred horse that was a part of his life before he was recruited into the Voltes V team.

title: A Model Ship Brings Big Falcon to a Crisis
synopsis: When one of the heroes leaves for a battleship model competition, the enemies decide to use this window to destroy the Voltes V team by unleashing two strong fighters.

title: The Secret Skill to Catch a Butterfly
synopsis: When the going gets tough, the efficacious "catching-a-butterfly" technique becomes the heroes' only hope against the deadly samurai robot deployed by the enemies.

title: The Tactic Revealed by the Grave
synopsis: While the enemies bring a stronger robot to better their position in the battle, one of the heroes learns a life-altering truth about his tragic past.

title: The March to Struggle
synopsis: When the enemies move toward the bird-shaped island of Ootorajima, a big sacrifice saves Voltes V and the heroes to give Earth a fighting chance.

title: Invaders from Outer Space
synopsis: The fate of Earth lies in the hands of five trainee warriors operating the formidable Voltes V, a machine specially built to counter the outer space enemies.
